title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 335 - Appointment of Employees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 335 - Appointment of Employees

State Regulations

Title A - Procedure (§ 335.1)

Title B - Continuing Appointment (§ 335.2 to 335.4)

Title C - PERMANENT APPOINTMENT (§ 335.5 to 335.9)

Title D - PERMANENT APPOINTMENT (§ 335.10 to 335.16)

Title E - Probationary Appointment (§ 335.17 to 335.18)

Title F - Temporary Appointment (§ 335.19 to 335.21)

Title G - Distinguished and University Professors and Distinguished Librarians (§ 335.22)

Title H - Appointment Year (§ 335.23 to 335.26)

Title I - Academic Freedom (§ 335.27)

Title J - Patents, Inventions and Copyright Policy (§ 335.28 to 335.29)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 8, ch. V, subch. B, pt. 335

Statutory authority: Education Law,, §, §353, 355, 355-a

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
